All Superinterfaces:
Resizable, Identifiable, Rebindable, Cluster, Group, Changeable, Entity, Startable, AbstractGroup
@ImplementedBy(DynamicClusterImpl.class)
public interface DynamicCluster
extends AbstractGroup, Cluster

A cluster of entities that can dynamically increase or decrease the number of entities. When quarantine is enabled:

    The DynamicCluster will have a child entity named "quarantine", which is a group for nodes that failed to start correctly.
  • The DynamicCluster's other children will be all nodes in the cluster (that have not been unmanaged/deleted).
  • The DynamicCluster's members will be all live nodes in the cluster.
  • The Quarantine group's members will be all problem nodes (all nodes that failed to start correctly)
When quarantine is disabled, the DynamicCluster will not have a "quarantine" child. Nodes that fail to start will be removed from the cluster (i.e. stopped and deleted).
